org.paukov.combinatorics

Class IntegerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.paukov.combinatorics.IntegerFactory

  • public class IntegerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a special factory to create integer vectors and generators
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Dmytro Paukov
    See Also:
    IntegerVector, IntegerGenerator

      • range

                  int to)

        Parameters:
        from - The first value
        to - The second value

        The vector
